trans-unit.source: Defines the core functionality for keys that are used with Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) objects.
trans-unit.target: 定義可搭配 Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) 物件的索引鍵的核心功能。

trans-unit.source: This class wraps NCrypt keys, not BCrypt keys.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會包裝 NCrypt 金鑰，不 BCrypt 金鑰。

trans-unit.source: NCrypt is a subset of CNG that provides key storage functionality.
trans-unit.target: NCrypt 是 CNG 提供金鑰的儲存體功能的子集。

trans-unit.source: BCrypt is a subset that provides base cryptographic services such as random number generation, hash functions, signatures, and encryption keys.
trans-unit.target: BCrypt 是提供基底的密碼編譯服務，例如產生隨機數字、 雜湊函式、 簽章和加密金鑰的子集。

trans-unit.source: Gets the algorithm that is used by the key.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引鍵使用的演算法。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the name of an encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定加密演算法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the algorithm group that is used by the key.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引鍵使用的演算法群組。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the name of an encryption algorithm group.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定加密演算法群組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> object that can be used with the specified algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref>可以搭配指定的演算法的物件。

trans-unit.source: This overload creates a key without a name, which means that the key is ephemeral (that is, it will not be persisted).
trans-unit.target: 這個多載會建立沒有名稱，這表示索引鍵是暫時金鑰 （也就是它不會保存）。

trans-unit.source: It also creates a default <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters> object that specifies a default <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> and other advanced parameters for the key.
trans-unit.target: 它也會建立預設<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters>物件，指定預設值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>及其他進階的參數索引鍵。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters>

trans-unit.source: The algorithm that the key will be used with.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵會搭配使用的演算法。

trans-unit.source: An ephemeral key.
trans-unit.target: 暫時金鑰。

trans-unit.source: algorithm is .
trans-unit.target: algorithmis .

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
trans-unit.target: 此系統上不支援 cryptography Next Generation (CNG)。

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Creates a named <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> object that provides the specified algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 建立具名<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref>物件，提供指定的演算法。

trans-unit.source: If `keyName` is provided, this overload creates a persisted key.
trans-unit.target: 如果`keyName`提供此多載會建立必要的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: If `keyName` is not provided, the key will be ephemeral.
trans-unit.target: 如果`keyName`未提供，這個索引鍵會是暫時性。

trans-unit.source: This overload also creates a default <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters> object that specifies a default <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> and other advanced parameters for the key.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載也會建立預設<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters>物件，指定預設值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>及其他進階的參數索引鍵。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters>

trans-unit.source: The algorithm that the key will be used with.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵會搭配使用的演算法。

trans-unit.source: The key name.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If a name is not provided, the key will not be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供名稱，不會保存金鑰。

trans-unit.source: A persisted or ephemeral key that provides the specified algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 永久或暫時索引鍵，提供指定的演算法。

trans-unit.source: algorithm is .
trans-unit.target: algorithmis .

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
trans-unit.target: 此系統上不支援 cryptography Next Generation (CNG)。

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Creates a named <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> object that provides the specified algorithm, using the supplied key creation parameters.
trans-unit.target: 建立具名<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref>提供指定的演算法，使用提供的金鑰建立參數物件。

trans-unit.source: If `keyName` is provided, this overload creates a persisted key.
trans-unit.target: 如果`keyName`提供此多載會建立必要的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: If `keyName` is not provided, the key will be ephemeral.
trans-unit.target: 如果`keyName`未提供，這個索引鍵會是暫時性。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm that the key will be used with.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵會搭配使用的演算法。

trans-unit.source: The key name.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If a name is not provided, the key will not be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供名稱，不會保存金鑰。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies advanced parameters for the method, including the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定進階的參數方法，包括<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A persisted or ephemeral key that provides the specified algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 永久或暫時索引鍵，提供指定的演算法。

trans-unit.source: algorithm is .
trans-unit.target: algorithmis .

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
trans-unit.target: 此系統上不支援 cryptography Next Generation (CNG)。

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Removes the key that is associated with the object.
trans-unit.target: 移除與物件相關聯的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: When you call the Delete method on an ephemeral key, it closes the handle to the key.
trans-unit.target: 當您在暫時的金鑰上呼叫 Delete 方法時，它會關閉的索引鍵的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: When you call the Delete method on a named key, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object can no longer be used after the named key is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 當您在具名的索引鍵呼叫 Delete 方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>物件不再使用之後刪除具名的索引鍵,。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to access a deleted key.
trans-unit.target: 您嘗試存取已刪除的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>所佔用。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: Checks to see whether a named key exists in the default key storage provider (KSP).
trans-unit.target: 檢查具名的金鑰是否存在預設金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP)。

trans-unit.source: The default KSP is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值 KSP 為<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key name.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the named key exists in the default KSP; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已命名的索引鍵存在於預設 KSP。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: keyName is .
trans-unit.target: keyNameis .

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
trans-unit.target: 此系統上不支援 cryptography Next Generation (CNG)。

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Checks to see whether a named key exists in the specified key storage provider (KSP).
trans-unit.target: 檢查具名的索引鍵是否存在於指定的金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP)。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to check for the existence of a key in a KSP other than the default KSP, which is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個多載檢查中 KSP KSP，預設值以外的索引鍵存在即<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key name.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The KSP to check for the key.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查索引鍵 KSP。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the named key exists in the specified provider; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已命名的索引鍵存在於指定的提供者。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: keyName or provider is .
trans-unit.target: keyNameor provider is .

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
trans-unit.target: 此系統上不支援 cryptography Next Generation (CNG)。

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Checks to see whether a named key exists in the specified key storage provider (KSP), according to the specified options.
trans-unit.target: 檢查具名的索引鍵是否存在於指定的金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP)，根據指定的選項。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to check for the existence of a key in a KSP other than the default <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>, and to specify key open options.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查是否有預設值以外的 KSP 中索引鍵使用此多載<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>，以及指定索引鍵開啟選項。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key name.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The KSP to search for the key.
trans-unit.target: 若要搜尋的索引鍵 KSP。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify options for opening a key.
trans-unit.target: 指定開啟金鑰選項的列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the named key exists in the specified provider; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已命名的索引鍵存在於指定的提供者。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: keyName or provider is .
trans-unit.target: keyNameor provider is .

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
trans-unit.target: 此系統上不支援 cryptography Next Generation (CNG)。

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Exports the key material into a BLOB, in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 將金鑰內容匯出至 BLOB，以指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) allows export in any format that the underlying key storage provider (KSP) supports.
trans-unit.target: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) 允許匯出任何基礎的金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP) 支援的格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows Vista,the default KSP (which is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>) only allows export of private keys in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyBlobFormat.Pkcs8PrivateBlob%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyBlobFormat.EccPrivateBlob%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyBlobFormat.OpaqueTransportBlob%2A> formats.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows Vista 中，預設 KSP (也就是<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>) 只允許匯出私密金鑰在<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyBlobFormat.Pkcs8PrivateBlob%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyBlobFormat.EccPrivateBlob%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyBlobFormat.OpaqueTransportBlob%2A>格式。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyBlobFormat.OpaqueTransportBlob%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyBlobFormat.EccPrivateBlob%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyBlobFormat.Pkcs8PrivateBlob%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: This restriction is controlled by the underlying KSP.
trans-unit.target: 這項限制是由基礎的 KSP 控制。

trans-unit.source: If you use a different KSP, other formats may apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用不同的 KSP，可能適用於其他格式。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the format of the key BLOB.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定的金鑰 BLOB 格式。

trans-unit.source: A BLOB that contains the key material in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 包含金鑰的內容中指定的格式的 BLOB。

trans-unit.source: format is .
trans-unit.target: formatis .

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.ExportPolicy*> does not allow the key to be exported.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.ExportPolicy*>不允許匯出金鑰。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.ExportPolicy*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the export policy that is used by the key.
trans-unit.target: 取得匯出原則，由索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The export policy controls the export frequency and format for the key.
trans-unit.target: 匯出原則控制的匯出頻率和索引鍵的格式。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the export policy for the key.
trans-unit.target: 指定金鑰的匯出原則的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a property, given a name and a set of property options.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性，指定名稱和一組屬性選項。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is to return the value of an arbitrary property of the key.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是要傳回索引鍵的任意屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The typical way to retrieve properties is by using the property accessors provided by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> class.
trans-unit.target: 擷取屬性的典型方式是使用屬性存取子中提供的<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>類別。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> provides wrappers for several, but not all, properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>提供數個，但不是全部內容包裝函式。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: The GetProperty method is primarily used to access the value of a property that is not wrapped.
trans-unit.target: GetProperty 方法主要用於存取不會換行屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful in the following cases: - A new version of the operating system supports a new Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) key property that does not have a wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是適用於下列情況:-新的作業系統版本支援新的 Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) 金鑰屬性沒有包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: - You add a custom property to the key.
trans-unit.target: -您可以加入自訂屬性的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The `options` parameter is specifically used to indicate the following: - Whether the property is built-in, or custom.
trans-unit.target: `options`參數特別用來指出下列:-屬性是否為內建或自訂。

trans-unit.source: - Whether the property should be persisted with the key.
trans-unit.target: -是否應該保存屬性與索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: These options must match the value that the property was set with, or the property will not be found.
trans-unit.target: 這些選項都必須符合已設定的屬性，或將找不到屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if the property cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>如果找不到屬性，會擲回。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.source: You should call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.HasProperty%2A> method first to avoid the exception instead of wrapping the method call in a `try/catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 您應該呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.HasProperty%2A>方法，以避免例外狀況，而不是包裝的方法呼叫中`try/catch`區塊。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.HasProperty%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the desired property.
trans-unit.target: 所需的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify options for the named property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的具名屬性選項的列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the raw value of the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含指定屬性的原始值。

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets a safe handle that represents a native key (NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE).
trans-unit.target: 取得代表原生的金鑰 (NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE) 的安全控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The returned handle is a duplicate of the handle in the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的控制代碼會在目前的控制代碼重複<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: It will persist even if the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> is disposed, and must be disposed of separately.
trans-unit.target: 它會持續保留，即使目前<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>處置時，且必須個別公開。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: You can release the current object and the handle in any order without any adverse effects.
trans-unit.target: 您可以釋放目前的物件，而且沒有任何負面影響的任何順序的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A safe handle that represents the key.
trans-unit.target: 安全控制代碼，代表索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Checks to see whether the specified property exists on the key.
trans-unit.target: 檢查指定的屬性是否存在的索引鍵上。

trans-unit.source: The `options` parameter is specifically used to indicate the following: - Whether the property is built-in, or custom.
trans-unit.target: `options`參數特別用來指出下列:-屬性是否為內建或自訂。

trans-unit.source: - Whether the property should be persisted with the key.
trans-unit.target: -是否應該保存屬性與索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: These options must match the value that the property was set with, or the property will not be found.
trans-unit.target: 這些選項都必須符合已設定的屬性，或將找不到屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: This method operates correctly even if the property is set to `false` or zero.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可正確運作即使屬性設定為`false`或零。

trans-unit.source: The property name to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify options for the named property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的具名屬性選項的列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified property is found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果找到指定的屬性。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: Creates a new key by importing the specified key material into the default key storage provider (KSP) and using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的金鑰指定的金鑰內容匯入的預設金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP)，並使用指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: The default KSP is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值 KSP 為<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > On Windows operating systems before Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2, some CNG key binary large object (BLOB) formats are not supported.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 上 Windows 作業系統在 Windows 7 和 Windows Server 2008 R2 之前，不支援某些 CNG 金鑰的二進位大型物件 (BLOB) 格式。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the key information.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，其中包含金鑰的資訊。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the format of the `keyBlob` array.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定的格式`keyBlob`陣列。

trans-unit.source: A new key.
trans-unit.target: 新的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: keyBlob or format is .
trans-unit.target: keyBlobor format is .

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
trans-unit.target: 此系統上不支援 cryptography Next Generation (CNG)。

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new key by importing the specified key material into the specified key storage provider (KSP), using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的金鑰匯入指定的金鑰內容到指定的金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP)，使用指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the key information.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，其中包含金鑰的資訊。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the format of the `keyBlob` array.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定的格式`keyBlob`陣列。

trans-unit.source: The KSP.
trans-unit.target: KSP。

trans-unit.source: A new key.
trans-unit.target: 新的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: keyBlob, format, or provider is .
trans-unit.target: keyBlob, format, or provider is .

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
trans-unit.target: 此系統上不支援 cryptography Next Generation (CNG)。

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets the persistence state of the key.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引鍵的持續性狀態。

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether the key is ephemeral (that is, the key exists only for the lifetime of the handle), or persisted (that is, the key exists independently of the handle).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會決定是否暫時金鑰 （也就是索引鍵存在只會針對此控制代碼的存留期），或保存 （也就是索引鍵存在獨立控制代碼）。

trans-unit.source: The return value depends on the method that is used to obtain the key: - If the key was not opened by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptKeyHandle%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyHandleOpenOptions%29> method overload, the common language runtime (CLR) is managing the key and can determine whether it is ephemeral.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值取決於用來取得金鑰的方法:-如果索引鍵不由所開啟<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptKeyHandle%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyHandleOpenOptions%29>方法多載時，common language runtime (CLR) 來管理金鑰，且可以判斷是否為暫時。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptKeyHandle%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyHandleOpenOptions%29>

trans-unit.source: - If the key was opened by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptKeyHandle%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyHandleOpenOptions%29> method overload, the CLR cannot determine whether it is ephemeral.
trans-unit.target: -如果索引鍵由所開啟<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptKeyHandle%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyHandleOpenOptions%29>方法多載時，CLR 無法判斷是否為暫時。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptKeyHandle%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyHandleOpenOptions%29>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the key is assumed to be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 因此，金鑰會假設為保存。

trans-unit.source: However, if this method is used to open a handle to a key that is created by the CLR, the CLR will be able to determine whether it is ephemeral.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果這個方法用來開啟的控制代碼由 CLR 建立的索引鍵，CLR 將能夠判斷其是否為暫時性。

trans-unit.source: This property does not have a public setter; it is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性並沒有公用 setter。它是唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is ephemeral; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果金鑰是暫時的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the scope (machine or user) of the key.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引鍵的範圍 （電腦或使用者）。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is available on a machine-wide basis; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the key is only for the current user.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果索引鍵使用全機器為基礎;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>索引鍵是否只針對目前的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the key.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引鍵的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the key.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the key is ephemeral, the value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果金鑰是暫時的這個值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key size in bits.
trans-unit.target: 取得金鑰的大小，以位元。

trans-unit.source: The key size in bits.
trans-unit.target: 位元金鑰的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cryptographic operations specified by the key.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引鍵所指定的密碼編譯作業。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the usages allowed for the key.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引鍵所允許的使用方式的列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> object that represents an existing named key.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref>物件，代表現有命名為索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: This overload uses the following defaults: - Key storage provider (KSP): <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載會使用下列的預設值:-金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP): <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider%29> overload if you want to specify another KSP.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider%29>多載，如果您想要指定另一個 KSP。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider%29>

trans-unit.source: - Key open options: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: -索引鍵開啟選項︰ <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The name of the key.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An existing key.
trans-unit.target: 現有的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: keyName is .
trans-unit.target: keyNameis .

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
trans-unit.target: 此系統上不支援 cryptography Next Generation (CNG)。

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> object by using a handle to an existing key.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref>使用現有的索引鍵的控制代碼的物件。

trans-unit.source: This overload enables advanced users to use the CNG classes even if they rely on platform invoke or the managed interop capability of C++.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載可讓進階的使用者使用 CNG 類別即使它們是依賴平台叫用或受管理的 c + + interop 功能。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a native library that returns the key as an NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE, this overload lets you create a managed wrapper around the key and use the CNG classes to manipulate it.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有原生程式庫傳回 NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE 形式的索引鍵，這個多載可讓您建立機碼的 managed 包裝函式和使用 CNG 類別，來操作它。

trans-unit.source: When you open a key by using its handle, you cannot determine the key's ephemeral state and must specify it yourself.
trans-unit.target: 當您開啟索引鍵使用其控制代碼時，您無法判斷金鑰的暫時狀態，也必須指定它自己。

trans-unit.source: Several properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> class rely on this value to be correct.
trans-unit.target: 有幾項屬性<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>類別依賴此值設為正確。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, make sure that you pass the correct flag value to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 因此，請確定您要的正確旗標值傳遞<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: A handle to an existing key.
trans-unit.target: 現有的金鑰控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether `keyHandle` represents an ephemeral key or a named key.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指出是否`keyHandle`代表暫時的金鑰或金鑰。

trans-unit.source: An existing key.
trans-unit.target: 現有的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: keyHandle is .
trans-unit.target: keyHandleis .

trans-unit.source: keyHandle is invalid or malformed, or it is already closed.
trans-unit.target: keyHandle無效或格式不正確，或已關閉。

trans-unit.source: This exception is also thrown if the key is an ephemeral key that is created by the common language runtime (CLR), but the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyHandleOpenOptions"></xref> value is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果按鍵是暫時的金鑰由 common language runtime (CLR)，也擲回這個例外狀況但<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyHandleOpenOptions"></xref>未指定值。

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
trans-unit.target: 此系統上不支援 cryptography Next Generation (CNG)。

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> object that represents an existing named key, using the specified key storage provider (KSP).
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref>物件，代表現有命名為索引鍵，使用指定的金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP)。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28System.String%29> method overload, this overload lets you specify the provider.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28System.String%29>方法多載，這個多載可以可讓您指定的提供者。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: In addition, a default <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions> value of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions> is created and bound to the key.
trans-unit.target: 此外，預設值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions>值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions>建立並繫結至索引鍵。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions>

trans-unit.source: The name of the key.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The KSP that contains the key.
trans-unit.target: KSP 包含索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: An existing key.
trans-unit.target: 現有的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: keyName or provider is .
trans-unit.target: keyNameor provider is .

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
trans-unit.target: 此系統上不支援 cryptography Next Generation (CNG)。

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> object that represents an existing named key, using the specified key storage provider (KSP) and key open options.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref>物件，代表現有命名為索引鍵，使用指定的金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP) 和金鑰開啟選項。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28System.String%29> method overload, this overload lets you specify both the provider and the key open options.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28System.String%29>方法多載，這個多載可以可讓您指定的提供者和索引鍵開啟 [選項]。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Open%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: The name of the key.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The KSP that contains the key.
trans-unit.target: KSP 包含索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify options for opening the key, such as where the key is opened from (machine or user storage) and whether to suppress UI prompting.
trans-unit.target: 指定開啟金鑰，例如 （電腦或使用者存放裝置） 從開啟的機碼的位置，以及是否要隱藏 UI 提示選項的列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: An existing key.
trans-unit.target: 現有的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: keyName or provider is .
trans-unit.target: keyNameor provider is .

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
trans-unit.target: 此系統上不支援 cryptography Next Generation (CNG)。

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the window handle (HWND) that should be used for user interface (UI) prompts caused by accessing the key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定應該用於存取金鑰所造成的使用者介面 (UI) 提示的視窗控制代碼 (HWND)。

trans-unit.source: The parent window handle for the key is used in UI prompts, such as smart card PIN prompts.
trans-unit.target: 使用索引鍵的父視窗控制代碼 UI 提示，例如智慧卡 PIN 提示。

trans-unit.source: This value is not persisted with persisted keys.
trans-unit.target: 此值不會保存使用保存的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you always set this property for keys that display a user interface.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您永遠將設定這個屬性，顯示使用者介面的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the default value of `null` for such keys.
trans-unit.target: 不使用的預設值`null`這類金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The parent window handle for the key.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的父視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key storage provider (KSP) that manages the key.
trans-unit.target: 取得管理金鑰的金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP)。

trans-unit.source: The KSP that manages the key.
trans-unit.target: KSP 管理金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Gets a native handle (an NCRYPT_PROV_HANDLE) to the key storage provider (KSP).
trans-unit.target: 取得原生控制代碼 (NCRYPT_PROV_HANDLE) 金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP)。

trans-unit.source: The returned handle is a duplicate of the handle in the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的控制代碼會在目前的控制代碼重複<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: It will persist even if the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> is disposed, and must be disposed of separately.
trans-unit.target: 它會持續保留，即使目前<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>處置時，且必須個別公開。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: You can release the current object and the handle in any order without any adverse effects.
trans-unit.target: 您可以釋放目前的物件，而且沒有任何負面影響的任何順序的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the KSP.
trans-unit.target: KSP 控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Sets a named property on the key.
trans-unit.target: 設定具名的屬性的索引鍵上。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to add a new custom property to an existing key by using a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您使用，將新的自訂屬性新增至現有的索引鍵<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty>

trans-unit.source: The options set on the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty> object must exactly match the options in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.GetProperty%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 上設定的選項<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty>物件必須完全符合中的選項<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.GetProperty%2A>呼叫。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.GetProperty%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the property will not be found.
trans-unit.target: 否則，不會找到屬性。

trans-unit.source: The key property to set.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定索引鍵的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets parameters that control the user interface (UI) for accessing the key.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制的存取金鑰的使用者介面 (UI) 的參數。

trans-unit.source: The key UI policy is used with UI prompts such as smart card PIN prompts.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的 UI 原則搭配 UI 提示，例如智慧卡 PIN 提示。

trans-unit.source: This policy also controls password dialog boxes for protected keys.
trans-unit.target: 此原則也會控制受保護的金鑰的密碼對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains configuration parameters for displaying the UI.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含顯示 UI 的組態參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique name for the key.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引鍵的唯一名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property gets an alternate name that can be used when accessing the key.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會取得存取金鑰時可用的替代名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property if the original key name does not uniquely identify the persisted key.
trans-unit.target: 如果原始的索引鍵名稱並未識別唯一的保存的金鑰，您可以使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A> property will return the file name of the key as this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>屬性會傳回為這個屬性的索引鍵的檔案名稱。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name returned by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSmartCardKeyStorageProvider%2A> is implementation-dependent.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的名稱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSmartCardKeyStorageProvider%2A>視實作而定。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSmartCardKeyStorageProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: An alternate name for the key.
trans-unit.target: 替代索引鍵名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the key is ephemeral, the value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果金鑰是暫時的這個值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
